item.title: 北达科他州小麦产量创纪录，小麦供应量将扩大
item.description: 北达科他州小麦产量创下历史新高，这将进一步扩大美国的谷物供应，并有助于抑制百吉饼等食品的通胀，这些食品的价格最近又开始上涨。【原文：Record-high wheat yields in North Dakota are set to further expand American grain supplies and should help to quell inflation for foods like bagels, where prices had recently started rising again.】

item.title: 马查多称委内瑞拉债权人受到过渡赔率上升的诱惑
item.description: 领导推翻马杜罗政权运动的玛丽亚-科里纳-马查多（María Corina Machado）说，随着反对派获胜的几率增加，一些赞成在尼古拉斯-马杜罗总统领导下进行重组的委内瑞拉债务持有人正在转变思路。【原文：Some of Venezuela’s debtholders who favored a restructuring under President Nicolás Maduro are shifting their thinking as odds of an opposition victory increase, said María Corina Machado, who leads the campaign to unseat the regime.】

item.title: 纽约养老基金施压美光达成工会协议
item.description: 纽约价值 2,600 亿美元的养老基金正在敦促美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.【原文：New York’s $260 billion pension fund is urging Micron Technology Inc. to adopt a global policy of labor neutrality, which would pave the way for workers at the company’s chip factories to form and join unions.】

item.title: 渴求现金的加拿大矿工测试反华并购规则的灰色地带
item.description: 在加拿大采取行动限制外国投资进入该国采矿业近两年后，矿产勘探者和开发商正在测试这些规则的极限。【原文：Nearly two years after Canada moved to restrict foreign investment in the country’s mining sector, minerals explorers and developers are testing the limits of those rules.】

item.title: Evercore 的 Schlosstein 称特朗普关税对股市构成威胁
item.description: Evercore Inc. 名誉主席拉尔夫-施洛斯坦（Ralph Schlosstein）认为，唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫将给美国股市带来风险。【原文：A return to the White House for Donald Trump poses a risk to the US stock market, according to Ralph Schlosstein, the chairman emeritus of Evercore Inc.】

item.title: 休斯顿公用事业公司首席执行官就贝里尔事件道歉，并承诺进行改革
item.description: 在飓风贝里尔导致休斯顿大部分地区连续数日停电后，休斯顿主要电力公司的负责人承诺改进风暴准备和应对措施。【原文：The head of Houston’s main electric utility promised to improve storm preparation and response after Hurricane Beryl left much of the city sweltering without power for days.】

item.title: 匈牙利在达成 10 亿欧元交易后接受中国贷款融资
item.description: 匈牙利说，它在 4 月份从中国获得了 10 亿欧元的贷款，并补充说，随着与这个亚洲国家的经济联系不断加强，此类融资今后可能会变得更加普遍。【原文：Hungary said it took a €1 billion loan in April from China, adding that such financing is likely to become more widespread in the future as economic links with the Asian nation grow.】

item.title: 特鲁多承诺放缓移民速度。加拿大银行心存疑虑
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）政府何时以及在多大程度上能够减少加拿大临时居民人数的不确定性越来越大，这使得财政和货币政策制定者的一项关键投入变得模糊不清。【原文：There’s mounting uncertainty about when and by how much Justin Trudeau’s government will be able to reduce the number of temporary residents in Canada, muddying a key input for fiscal and monetary policymakers.】

item.title: 多伦多公寓投资者受到市场 "衰退 "水平的冲击
item.description: 多伦多公寓市场正在恶化到 "衰退的地步"，因为去年每月在新建单位上亏损的投资者数量激增。【原文：The Toronto condo market is deteriorating to “recessionary territory” as the number of investors losing money each month on newly built units surged last year.】

item.title: Lineage 44 亿美元首次公开募股后股价大涨 5%，温暖了不温不火的市场
item.description: 温控存储和物流巨头 Lineage 公司在今年最大的首次公开募股中募集了约 44 亿美元，在首次公开募股中股价上涨了 5.1%。【原文：Temperature-controlled storage and logistics giant Lineage Inc. shares opened 5.1% higher in its debut as a public company after raising about $4.4 billion in the year’s biggest initial public offering.】

item.title: 康采恩 5.29 亿美元美国首次公开募股后股价下滑
item.description: Select Medical Holdings Corp. 旗下职业健康服务提供商 Concentra 在首次公开募股中筹集了 5.29 亿美元，发行价接近市场定价区间的底部，此后该公司股价下跌达 6.5%。【原文：Shares of Concentra, Select Medical Holdings Corp.’s occupational health services provider, declined as much as 6.5% after the company raised $529 million in an initial public offering priced near the bottom of a marketed range.】

item.title: 华尔街的 ETF 引擎在 170 亿美元的比特币交易后加速运转
item.description: 在美国监管机构批准追踪全球第二大加密货币的以太币交易所交易基金（ETF）后不到 48 小时，资产管理公司就急忙为这一新兴的数字资产类别推出新产品。【原文：Barely 48 hours after US regulators approved Ether ETFs tracking the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency, asset managers are rushing to crank out fresh products for the fledgling digital-asset class.】

item.title: 摩根大通就潜在的沃尔格林垃圾债券向投资者发出警告
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通公司正在就沃尔格林博姿联盟公司（Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is sounding out investors on a potential high-yield bond sale by Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. to address the recently downgraded drug-store chain’s near-term debt maturities, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司首席执行官称纽约上市计划正取得进展
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）首席执行官帕特里克-普瓦纳（Patrick Pouyanne）表示，这家法国能源巨头正在推进在纽约上市的计划，以吸引更多的美国投资者。【原文：TotalEnergies SE Chief Executive Officer Patrick Pouyanne said the French energy giant is progressing with its plan to list shares in New York in a bid to lure more US investors.】

item.title: 布拉瓦特尼克为 Dazn 签订法国广播协议提供担保
item.description: 流媒体集团 Dazn Group 的亿万富翁 Len Blavatnik 提供了资金担保，以支持其集团赢得法国精英职业足球联赛的转播权竞标。【原文：Len Blavatnik, the billionaire owner of streaming group Dazn Group, has given a financial guarantee to back his group’s winning bid for broadcasting rights of France’s elite professional football league.】

item.title: 耶伦在被问及特朗普的美元言论时标榜七国集团的承诺
item.description: 在被问及美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普最近指责强势美元损害美国出口竞争力的言论时，财政部长珍妮特-耶伦强调了七国集团支持市场决定汇率的承诺。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen highlighted commitments by Group of Seven nations backing market-set exchange rates when asked about recent remarks by former President Donald Trump that blamed a strong dollar for hurting US export competitiveness.】

item.title: 中国将参加东非反恐演习
item.description: 国防部发言人张晓刚表示，中国军队将于本月晚些时候参加与莫桑比克和坦桑尼亚的联合反恐演习。【原文：Chinese military forces will participate in joint counter-terrorism exercises with Mozambique and Tanzania later this month, Ministry of National Defense spokesman Zhang Xiaogang said.】

item.title: 纳斯达克首席执行官阿迪娜-弗里德曼认为 2025 年 IPO 势头将加快
item.description: 纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc.首席执行官阿迪娜-弗里德曼（Adena Friedman）表示，首次公开募股市场正在缓慢恢复，预计明年将获得发展。【原文：The market for initial public offerings is slowly coming back and expected to gain traction next year, according to Nasdaq Inc. Chief Executive Officer Adena Friedman.】

item.title: 汇丰银行的 Kettner 称，在其他公司犹豫不决时，买入科技股
item.description:
下周的大型财报可能达到或超过预期

。【原文：

Big earnings reports next week may meet or exceed expectations

】

item.title: 美国支持加拿大堵住中国电动汽车 "漏洞 "的行动
item.description: 美国驻加拿大大使表示，贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理的政府正在弥补一个 "漏洞"，使中国支持的电动汽车可以避开美国的关税，通过加拿大进入美国。【原文：The US ambassador to Canada said he’s encouraged by signs of Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government closing a “loophole” that might have allowed Chinese-backed electric vehicles to enter the US via Canada, sidestepping its tariffs.】

item.title: 2024 年日本最大 IPO 为解决就业紧张问题提供创新方案
item.description: 周五，一款帮助日本解决严重劳动力短缺问题的创新型工作匹配应用程序的开发商上市，这是日本今年迄今为止规模最大的首次公开募股。【原文：The developer of an innovative job matchmaking app helping Japan tackle its severe labor shortage goes public Friday following the nation’s largest initial public offering so far this year.】

item.title: 印度央行提出银行优质流动资产新规则
item.description: 印度储备银行建议，银行应以不高于当前市场利率的价格对以政府证券形式保存的优质流动资产进行估值。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India has proposed that banks should value their high quality liquid assets, kept in the form of government securities, at no greater than their current market rate.】

item.title: 自由港液化天然气枢纽将于八月初重启三条生产线
item.description: 据直接知情人士透露，美国第二大出口设施自由港液化天然气公司的目标是在 8 月初重启所有生产线。【原文：Freeport LNG, the US’s second-largest export facility, is targeting the restart of all production lines in early August, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 私人信贷基金将拉丁美洲视为下一个前沿阵地
item.description: 在 1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷行业遭遇 2020 年以来最严重的筹资低迷之际，私人信贷基金正在向拉丁美洲多元化发展，以吸引新的投资者。【原文：Private credit funds are diversifying into Latin America to drum up new investors as the $1.7 trillion industry endures the worst fundraising slump since 2020.】

item.title: 尼日利亚将发行 5 亿美元美元证券
item.description: 尼日利亚财政部长瓦莱-埃顿（Wale Edun）表示，尼日利亚政府计划在国内市场出售 5 亿美元的美元证券，以吸引居住在国外的尼日利亚公民持有的外汇。【原文：Nigeria’s government plans to sell $500 million of dollar-denominated securities in the domestic market to attract foreign currency held by its citizens living abroad, Finance Minister Wale Edun said.】

item.title: 据说 CATL 供应商洛帕尔公司将为印度尼西亚分公司寻求 2 亿美元的投资
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，江苏洛铂科技股份有限公司正在考虑为其印尼子公司融资约2亿美元，因为该公司正在当地加强电动汽车电池所用材料的生产。【原文：Jiangsu Lopal Tech Co. is considering raising about $200 million for its Indonesian unit as it ramps up local production of materials used in electric-vehicle batteries, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 阿波罗将在最新英国包裹交易中从竞争对手 Advent 手中收购 Evri
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. has agreed to buy parcel delivery company Evri Ltd from private equity rival Advent International, the latest UK deal in a sector that’s been spurred on by the e-commerce boom.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织计划下周召开董事会讨论埃塞俄比亚新贷款计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）执行董事会定于下周召开会议，讨论埃塞俄比亚提出的新基金支持计划申请。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s executive board of directors is scheduled to meet next week over Ethiopia’s request for a new fund-supported program, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省野火肆虐加拿大落基山脉贾斯珀镇
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省的一场野火迅速蔓延，席卷了度假胜地贾斯珀，摧毁了这个风景优美的社区的建筑。【原文：A fast-moving wildfire in Alberta has ripped through the resort town of Jasper, destroying buildings in the scenic community that had been evacuated earlier in this week as the blaze approached.】

item.title: 高盛向 1,290 亿美元的地方政府 ETF 市场下更大赌注
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）将推出四只新的市政债券交易所交易基金，为价值 1,290 亿美元的州和地方政府债务市场再添一角。【原文：Goldman Sachs Asset Management is launching four new municipal-bond exchange-traded funds, adding to the $129 billion corner of the state and local government debt market.】
